scripts.test: npm run prettier && truffle compile && mocha --recursive --exit --timeout 5000000
scripts.testTransfers: npm run prettier && truffle compile && mocha --recursive --exit --timeout 5000000 --grep 'transfer()'
scripts.testDex: npm run prettier && truffle compile && mocha --recursive --exit --timeout 5000000 --grep 'Dex buy and sell'
scripts.testLiquidity: npm run prettier && truffle compile && mocha --recursive --exit --timeout 5000000 --grep 'Adding and removing liquidity'
scripts.testBurn: npm run prettier && truffle compile && mocha --recursive --exit --timeout 5000000 --grep 'Stop burn at 60%'
scripts.testLpDistribution: npm run prettier && truffle compile && mocha --recursive --exit --timeout 5000000 --grep 'Distribute fees to lp'
